ARABIC: ٱلَّذِينَ إِذَا ٱكْتَالُوا۟ عَلَى ٱلنَّاسِ يَسْتَوْفُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Those who, when they take a measure from people, exact full measure,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Who insist on being given full when they take from others,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: those who, when they take from others by measure, take their full share;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: those who demand a full measure from others
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Those who when they take the measure from others, take it in full!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Those who, when they have to receive by measure from men, demand full measure,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Who, when they take the measure (of their dues) from men take it fully,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: when they measure against the people, take full measure
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Those who when they take the measure from mankind demand it full,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: who demand of other people full measure for themselves,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Those who, when they take by measure from mankind, exact the full,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: who, when they measure [a commodity bought] from the people, take the full measure,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Those who, when they have to receive by measure from men, exact full measure,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Those who, when they have to receive by measure from men, demand full measure,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: who, when people measure for them, take full measure,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Those who, when they take a measure from people, they take in full.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Who, when they take a measure from people, take in full.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [83:2] those who, when they take measure from people, demand [it] in full, the measure;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: Allah then explained who these defrauders are, saying: (Those who when they take the measure from mankind) those who, when they buy from people and weigh or measure that which they buy for themselves, (demand it full) they weigh and measure their merchandise in full, 738
